prompt:
Patient: Yes, please.

Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Nurse: Okay, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm calling today to ensure you have everything you need for your colonoscopy. I will also call you again the day before your procedure. Let's first get all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy procedure is scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 8:00 AM. Is that okay with you?

Patient: At.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Valenzuela, could you please repeat what you just said?

Patient: I didn't say anything.

Nurse: My apologies for the confusion, Mr. Valenzuela. Your colonoscopy procedure is scheduled for August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 8:00 AM. Is that okay with you?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Great, Mr. Valenzuela. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st floor of the hospital. Does that sound alright to you?
responses.our_model: Okay, Mr. Valenzuela. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Does that sound good to you?
